resources.string:
This is the catalog screen.
 
 Click "refresh" in the corner menu to download a list of available titles.
 
 Find an interesting title, click to download that hint file (or click and hold for more options), and then click to open it in the reader screen.
 
 Graphical hints can be zoomed with two fingers and panned by dragging. Sometimes they will contain clickable regions indicated by a dashed outline.
